item.title: How Do I Make Xp Change?
item.dc:creator: @crakaman crakaman
item.description:
@crakaman wrote:

Ok well if it was the target the one that gives range xp
First step. Search Client.java for case 2514 (2514 is the code for the object for others just search there object code) you should see something like this

if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You aim at the target, Score!"); actionName = "range1"; actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(426); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[18]), 18); addItem(1464, 10); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

At the addskillXp((100"playerlevel[4]), 4); the 100 is the xp that you get and the [4] is the skill that it will give xp to

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make Xp Change?
